title: Final words from Scentre's Greg Miles: more change is coming
text:
Veteran Scentre executive Greg Miles expects the pace of change among shopping malls to accelerate as the better players differentiate themselves, combating challenges in the retail sector.

That forecast comes as the well-respected Mr Miles steps down as chief operating officer ahead of his retirement next year following 23 years with the owner and manager of Westfield malls.

"There needs to be more integration between physical and online and the retailers are moving through that process," he told The Australian Financial Review.

"That will accelerate the amount of change. Not all retail is created equal."

Scentre Group's Greg Miles. Dominic Lorrimer

Mr Miles expects better malls to distinguish themselves more rapidly from lesser malls as more investment follows better sales. Those stronger sales figures are still somewhat masked in overall retail sales figures on national level, he said.
description: The veteran retailer says "there needs to be more integration between physical and online and the retailers are moving through that process".
